about_the_game:
This is a free version of the game containing one dungeon. It is not for the weak, the five top players who complete the dungeon with the highest score will win a key to the final game (including the early access version)

You have until the end of October to slide to the top of the scoreboard.

Have fun!

content_descriptors.notes: The game display graphic gore/violence when the player dies. We plan to offer an option to toggle it.

detailed_description:
This is a free version of the game containing one dungeon. It is not for the weak, the five top players who complete the dungeon with the highest score will win a key to the final game (including the early access version)

You have until the end of October to slide to the top of the scoreboard.

Have fun!

linux_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Ubuntu 16.04
  • Processor: Intel or AMD
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GT 640m
  • Storage: 500 MB available space
linux_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Ubuntu 16.04
  • Processor: Intel or AMD
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GTX 1050
  • Storage: 500 MB available space

mac_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: macOS 10.11
  • Processor: Intel or AMD
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GT 640m
  • Storage: 500 MB available space
mac_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: macOS 10.11
  • Processor: Intel or AMD
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GTX 1050
  • Storage: 500 MB available space

name: Infinitrap : Rehamstered Edition Demo

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS *: Windows 7 32bits
  • Processor: Intel or AMD
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GT 640m
  • Storage: 500 MB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows 10 64bits
  • Processor: Intel or AMD
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GTX 1050
  • Storage: 500 MB available space

It is not for the weak, the five top players who complete the dungeon with the highest score will win a key to the final game (including the early access version) You have until the end of October to slide to the top of the scoreboard.
